StaticIpArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the static IP (for example, `arn:aws:lightsail:us-east-2:123456789101:StaticIp/244ad76f-8aad-4741-809f-12345EXAMPLE` ).

IsAttached.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the static IP is attached to an instance.

IpAddress.description: The IP address of the static IP.

description: The `AWS::Lightsail::StaticIp` resource specifies a static IP that can be attached to an Amazon Lightsail instance that is in the same AWS Region and Availability Zone.

AttachedTo.description: The instance that the static IP is attached to.

StaticIpName.description: The name of the static IP.
